title: ICMAI June 2026 Exam: Admission, Registration & Payment Deadline Extended!
content:
# ICMAI June 2026 Exam: Admission, Registration & Payment Deadline Extended!

Ek important update hai! The Institute of Cost Accountants of India (ICMAI) ne students ke liye ek relief announce kiya hai.

*   **What's Extended:** The cut-off date for admission, registration, and enrollment of students for the June 2026 term of examination has been extended.
*   **Also Extended:** The second installment payment for registered students in Intermediate and Final Courses has also received an extension.
*   **New Due Date:** The revised deadline for both is now February 10, 2026 (Tuesday).
*   **Original Due Date (Before Extension):** The previous cut-off date was January 31, 2026.
*   **Notification Details:** This extension has been granted in pursuance of Regulation 20B of The Cost and Works Accountants Regulation, 1959. The official notification is No. G/128/01/2026, dated January 30, 2026.
*   **Applicable For:** This extension applies to Foundation, Intermediate, and Final Courses under Syllabus 2022 for the June 2026 term.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification here](https://icmai.in/upload_documents/G/128/01/2026.pdf)

*Published on: 12 February 2026*
